reviews.review: This game scratches a certain itch in my spirit.  Its funny, scary and you feel really acompllished when you win thegame.

i love the fact that i am forced to run and hide... that i cant pull out a pistol or a grenade, or a bow n' arrow or a bazooka, or a flame thrower, or call in an air strike or nuke the SOB... but if i could i would... but for now, i will just settle for escaping to play another game.... BUT one of these days... POW, right in the Kissa!  no regrets.

DBD é DBD não tem como estragarem o jogo, mas ultimamente a Behavior vem fazendo um trabalho de baiano (sem querer ofender os baianos), só adicionam o que querem no jogo e dificilmente escutam a comunidade, a programação é toda fodida, tanto que quando adicionam algo novo surgem 50 bugs no lugar e é mal otimizado igual Mineirinho. Porém tenho que concordar que a comunidade chora pra krl pros devs, qualquer coisinha que mudam já falam que mataram o DBD. Resumindo: o jogo é bom e divertido tanto de killer quanto de survs, solo ou com amigos, mas tem muitos problemas e a behavior invés de resolver fica adicionando skins novas.
Very frustraiting game, needs two seperate matchmakings
Bom jogo, o ruim é que possui bastantes DLC's, Seria melhor aumentar um pouco o preço e colocar tudo junto

This game is as tense as a man on a tight rope, about as balanced as a man on tight rope with one leg, and as well made as the prosthetic that just fell off said man. That said, its wildly fun and addictive to play (and NOT in a microtransation/lootbox way). It is not pay to win and has nice progress for the player and characters. 
The story pieces are actually interesting, characters are varied and unique, and the story progression forces you to try new things in the game at your own pace.

Its a 4v1 "horror" game, but after a few losses, its just PvP with a horror theme, scary only in chases and a few jump scares if your not paying attention. Games can be wildly lopsided as per the horrible matchmaking system making them sometimes hilarious instead as the survivors and killer attempt to commune via butt dancing. Even in games where I die first, I find myself spectating the match just because the gameplay is so exhilarating. 

Artwork and cosmetics are expensive but often worth it. 

There are two major downsides of the game, first is the balance issues. Mostly around mori's and keys. The best games are long and drawn out, tense and even. But killer mori's (which allow killers to remove players from the game for only half the work) often end the game quickly and put survivors in a bad and boring spot. Winning against pimped out mori killer is like crossing a tightrope with only minor training. Whereas keys, a survivor item, allows survivors to leave the match early (with a victory), so long as they can find the hatch and complete enough gens. Not as frustrating, but can be annoying when they cheat the escape on a tight game. Its like they have that tight rope walk, but there are two guys with sticks on the other end keeping them balanced and pulling them forward.
The other major issue is toxicity. This is really an issue in any pvp game, but it seems worse when killers abuse mechanics to take the game hostage (Slugging all players so they are stuck on the ground bleeding out for four minutes). Or when survivors DC, give up right away, start flaming in the end chat (often for no real reason). 

7/10 overall, will probably play this until I develop an anxiety disorder.
one of the best pvp ive played in a long time
Played on console for about two years and finally got around to playing on PC and it's just as fun, if not more so! Very simple concept for a game that's executed very well. Hope they keep updating!

The matches are quite difficult sometimes depending on your skill level, or even frame rate and visual effects. However, with friends it's quite a lot of fun. I play survive with friends nearly every time I'm on here, sadly I'm the lowest rank and they're the highest so I die easier, however it's fun while playing. 
My computer sucks so I'm unable to run the game at anything higher than the lowest resolution possible, but I still enjoy it.

The best survival horror game ever, 
Its for any horror coop game lover. 
(BTW, best to play with +3 friends)
muy divertido para jugar con amigos, si no tenes amigos no lo compres

1.Здесь не преобладает никакой физический фактор персонажей. 
Выжившие с лёгкостью могут уйти из под удара того же большого ножа, с простотой могут обойти убийцу.
Это абсолютно не логично.
2. Хочешь получить острых ощущений? Увы. Здесь нет ничего крипового. Ты когда понимаешь что в игре слишком светло и хочешь понизить яркость, чтобы хоть как-то стало страшнее, тебе говорят - х*й тебе, играй в "дневное" время суток.
3. Слишком мало возможностей прогресса развития персонажа, слишком мало рейтинга и поощрений.
4. Ты покупаешь игру, а после чего покупаешь предметы в ней, чтобы получить какие-то новые ощущения и впечатления. 
Она совершенно не оправдывает ожиданий.
this game is so much fun! especially when you get to play with your friends. 10/10 would buy again.
o jogo da muito medo no começo mas com o tempo você se acostuma,o lado ruim é cair com pessoas de rank muito mais alto que o seu,mas o jogo é legal.

Great co-op game for friends and still fun to play by yourself. Exciting to play as both the survivor and the killer plus you get to see and play as/play with many familiar characters from famous horror movies and shows. Definitely buy this if you and your friends are looking for a new co-op game with elements of action, suspense, and strategy.
I suck, bad, at this game. But it still entertains me. I recommend.

Jugué 15h hasta que un problema técnico apareció. Contacté con el Servicio al Cliente el cual me envió una lista gigantesca de cosas que tenía que hacer o verificar. No sirvió de nada, y no me apetece seguir perdiendo el tiempo con errores generales que no se adaptan a mi problema. Desinstalé el juego. No estoy para nada satisfecho.

I have played 15hours and one technical bug arrived. I have contacted the Client Support who sent me a huge list to do and check in my pc... for nothing... I don't want to waste more time with tasks that don't suit my problems. I finally uninstalled the game. I am not satisfied.
Gra jest zajebista tyle mogę powiedzieć.

Sin duda es un multijugador totalmente innovador y muy bien realizado. Además, los actualizaciones de asesinos y supervivientes hace que el juego no llegue a ser tan monótono, (cosa que en un pasado pasaba, cuando me compré el juego). La única falla destacable de este videojuego es a la hora de buscar partida o unirse con amigos, que parece que está como el primer día, le cuesta mucho rendir en este aspecto. En resumen, si este juego te engancha, lo va a hacer bien si te llama este estilo.

There's many things to learn if you're a beginner like me and you will die a lot, but for some reason it's still fun and addicting. It also seems that there are toxic elitist out there. Either way from what I've played it's a solid game to play with friends. Or to end friendships.

Bom jogo, mas alguns fatos. Ele é mal otimizado, desbalanceado, a desenvolvedora do jogo as vezes faz caca, só adiciona coisas ao jogo mas não otimiza. Mas é um bom jogo, não me arrependo de gastar cada centavo nele, comprem caso tenham paciência, mas se você se estressa fácil, não é recomendado.
Un excelente juego para pasar el rato, si juegas con amigos es mucho mas divertido, en definitiva, es un juego que debes de tener un tu biblioteca.
